periods.name: Today
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 92, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 105. South southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 76, with temperatures rising to around 78 overnight. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Monday
